The Olliv Chrome Extension allows users to securely access their self-custodial wallets on the web.  

Olliv’s self-custody wallet solution enables you to safely buy, sell, swap, send, and receive your crypto at the touch of a finger. By providing users with sole access to their wallet keys, the Olliv platform ensures you always maintain control of your assets.   

Trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and other popular cryptocurrencies with ease. Our easy-to-use platform is paired with our award-winning customer support, available 24/7.  

Easily fund your transactions with your debit card or bank account. With the Olliv platform, securely access your crypto from your computer or phone. 


Olliv’s Self-Custody Model  

Unlike traditional exchanges, Olliv doesn’t hold user funds   

Store your crypto securely with Olliv’s self-custodial wallet model  

You have total control of your wallet keys  

Easily import and track your crypto assets across multiple wallets, all in one platform  

 
Support To Start Your Journey  

As an Olliv platform user, you will have access to our award-winning customer service  

Real, live humans available 24/7 over the phone to answer your questions and provide support   


Buy, Sell, And Send Crypto with Ease  

Investing in crypto can happen at any hour in the day, as markets are open 24 hours a day, every day of the year 

Debit card and ACH payment methods allow you to easily access crypto markets 

Send crypto to your best friend in Brussels or your abuelita in Argentina  

 
Supported Assets  

Buy, sell, and swap the most popular cryptocurrencies 

The Olliv dashboard allows you to easily view the highest-cap crypto markets and track active daily movers 

 
Security & Regulation at Our Core  

We use advanced encryption technologies to keep your identity and your account secure 

Protect your crypto with a self-custodial wallet created on the Olliv platform or connect a self-custodial wallet of your choice  

Olliv is an extension of CoinFlip, a trusted crypto kiosk provider that was founded in Chicago, IL in 2015  

State-of-the-art encryption is guaranteed through our secure and intuitive platform 


Track Assets Across Wallets  

Our wallet add feature eliminates the need to view crypto assets fractured across many different platforms 

Adding an existing self-custodial wallet allows you to maintain clear and concise portfolio tracking
